rationale: The agent correctly implements the null check validation for searchRequest in PutWarmerRequest.java, adding the same validation logic as ground truth (checking if searchRequest is null before calling validate()). However, the agent is missing several important changes: (1) removal of the @Nullable annotation from searchRequest() method, (2) removal of the unused import 'org.elasticsearch.common.Nullable', and (3) the entire test file PutWarmerRequestTests.java was not modified to add the validation test case. The validation order differs slightly (agent checks name first, then searchRequest; ground truth checks searchRequest first, then name), but this is functionally equivalent. The missing test is a significant omission as it verifies the new validation behavior works correctly.
